  • Constructor Details

    • SchoolBoard

      public SchoolBoard(School school, ColorTower colorTower, boolean hasPlayerAlreadyPlayedAdvancedCards)
      Constructor class to set the school board
      Parameters:
      school - is the board that contains entrance, dining hall, students and professors
      colorTower - tower color of player's board, one for each player
      hasPlayerAlreadyPlayedAdvancedCards - flag to report if the player has already played an advanced card, since a player can play only one advanced card per turn.

  • Method Details

    • getEntrance

      public List<ColorCharacter> getEntrance()
      get the students on the entrance of the school board
      Returns:
      students on the entrance of the school board, which are represented by a list

    • getTeachers

      public List<ColorCharacter> getTeachers()
      get teachers on the school board
      Returns:
      list of teachers on the school board

    • getTables

      public int[] getTables()
      get the tables on which are sat the students.
      Returns:
      The array of integers containing the students sitting in each dining hall: the index of the array represents which color is the table(students can sit on a table only if they have the same color of the table), the integer is the number of students sit in the dining hall. For example if array[0] == 6 in the first table there are 6 students.

    • getTowers

      public int getTowers()
      Get towers on the school board
      Returns:
      an integer representing the number of towers on the school board

    • getTowerColor

      public ColorTower getTowerColor()
      get color tower assigned to the school board, (one for each player).
      Returns:
      Color of the tower
      See Also:
      • ColorTower

    • addStudentEntrance

      private String addStudentEntrance(int index)
      given the index of student entrance, print the selected student entrance
      Parameters:
      index - index of student entrance to print

    • addTower

      private String addTower(int index)
      given the index of student entrance, print the selected student entrance
      Parameters:
      index - of tower to print
      Returns:
      printed string

    • addTable

      private String addTable(int index)
      given the index, print the corresponding table in the school board
      Parameters:
      index - index of the school table to print
      Returns:
      printed string of the school table

    • isAdvancedAlreadyPlayedThisTurn

      public boolean isAdvancedAlreadyPlayedThisTurn()
      get the value of flag that report is an advanced card has been played on this turn.
      Returns:
      true if an advanced card has been played this turn, false otherwise.
